reference.title: CMM support for EIR enhancements (Feature f11309-02): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature enhances the EIR error handling and offers a new choice of only rejecting the UE attach when the Equipment-Status AVP in the ME Identity Check Answer (ECA) message from the EIR is denylisted.

table.title: CMM support for EIR enhancements: feature summary

row.entry: 3GPP TS 29.272: Mobility Management Entity (MME) and Serving GPRS Support Node (SGSN) related interfaces based on Diameter protocol

entry.ph: EIR check result of Equipment Unknown to attach successfully (Feature f11309-03)
